hypernets_processor.data_io.dataset_util module¶

DatasetUtil class

class hypernets_processor.data_io.dataset_util.DatasetUtil¶

Bases: object

Class to provide utilities for generating standard xarray DataArrays

static add_encoding(variable, dtype, scale_factor=1.0, offset=0.0, fill_value=None, chunksizes=None)¶

Add encoding to xarray Variable to apply when writing netCDF files

Parameters

  • variable (xarray.Variable) – data variable

  • dtype (type) – numpy data type

  • scale_factor (float) – variable scale factor

  • offset (float) – variable offset value

  • fill_value (int/float) – (optional) fill value

  • chunksizes (float) – (optional) chucksizes

static add_units(variable, units)¶

Add units attributes to xarray Variable

Parameters

  • variable (xarray.Variable) – data variable

  • units (str) – variable units

static create_array3d_variable(length, width, height, dtype, standard_name=None, long_name=None, dim_names=None, fill_value=None)¶

Parameters

  • width (int) – array width

  • height (int) – array height

  • dtype (type) – numpy data type

  • long_name (str) – (optional) variable long name attribute

  • dim_names (list) – (optional) dimension names
